summary.p: Repeats a string for a specified number of times.

syntax.code: REPLICATE(str AS string, count AS int) RETURNS string

param.name: str
param.p: Specifies the string to be repeated.

param.name: count
param.p: Is a positive number that specifies how many times str should be repeated.

returns.p: If count is negative, NULL is returned. Otherwise str concatenated count times is returned.
